name: Blast Back
description:
A short, top-down, reasonably difficult shooter where you play as aliens invading Earth.

Features

  • Unconventional movement based on spinning and boosting off of enemies.
  • A linear story mode with four varied levels and two boss battles.
  • A wide range of enemies and power-ups.
  • Endless Arena mode in different areas.

How to Play (Explained in-game)

  • Use right and left click to turn and move.
  • Press X to fire and space to break
  • Spin and hit enemies with your engines to boost off of them.

The Beginner's Circle Jam #3 is my first game jam,  and I (stupidly) thought there was only a week. I would have been more adventurous had I known. All art, coding and some sound effects are by me. All music and other sounds are available from FesliyanStudios.com.
